subject: Re: MiniBox on eBay and other stuff
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi Ron,

Thanks for your comments and explanation... and thanks for the kudos!
Yes, that was good to get a couple more of your Mini Boxes in the 
hands of researchers here.
I'm also looking forward to seeing those new devices you talk about 
on the website.

Take care,
- Mike
